356b2(mdo sde): yin pa du bas yongs su bskor te/ mdur gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' se ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de
356b3(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ de stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom
356b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas byung ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
356b5(mdo sde): zhig 'das na/ gang gi 'khor dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di lan stsal du gsol/ byang
356b6(mdo sde): bya chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis na yang / dbug phyin par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i phyir byang
356b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang / dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang
357a1(mdo sde): ngas sngonas so'i skye ba'i dus na kun tu brten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pa de ltar bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung
357a2(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de'i du se na
357a3(mdo sde): khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin tu ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so// dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba
357a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi 'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o// re zhig ma sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags
357a5(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa'i sems su gyur nas/ re zhig na khyim bdag des legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so// de nas dge slong des skye ba mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i
357a6(mdo sde): phyir dang / 'jig rten la stong brtse ba'i phyir dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad ces pa'i chos kyi rnam
357a7(mdo sde): grangs bstan te/ khyim bdag dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te//
357b1(mdo sde): gang dang gang du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ 'khor mang pos lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur/ yo byad
357b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor par 'gyur/ lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de la ri
357b3(mdo sde): dang rtsig pa rnams kyis sgrib par mi byed de/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs par gyur nas/ dge slong de'i
357b4(mdo sde): rkang ba la phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ston cig dang / des bdag la mngon sum du'agyur ro// de nas dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas/
357b5(mdo sde): khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes na/ yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// des ni lci ba sar pa bsres pa'i// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham
357b6(mdo sde): par bya// sems can kun dang thun mong du// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang // gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas
357b7(mdo sde): dag gang yod pa// de dag rnams la yongs su sngo// de nas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste// 'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang // thub pa skyes
358a1(mdo sde): / mchog nam mkha' dang // kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang // gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang // sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang /
358a2(mdo sde): de bzhin sa yi snying po ste// de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o// khyim bdag 'di ni dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ 'di ni bdag gis bcom
358a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon sum du thos so// khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig/ kun nas skal pa mthun pa yi// 'khor
358a4(mdo sde): nams gang zhig 'dod pa des// dkyil 'khor brgyad ni bya bar bya// gang zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang // lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang //
358a5(mdo sde): blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzangs 'dod// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchog brgyad bya// seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung
358a6(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar
358a7(mdo sde): gyur to// seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am/ yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta
358b1(mdo sde): ste/ 'ating de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to// ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang / sangs rgyas nyid ma
358b2(mdo sde): thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos 'di kun tu bstan to// bsgoms so// mang du byas so// rigs kyi bu gang gis na nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di/
358b3(mdo sde): 'dra bar gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang / dge
358b4(mdo sde): slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
358b5(mdo sde): bdas kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan
358b6(mdo sde): po dzi na mi tra la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
358b7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ yAr+ya a mri ta war+Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
359a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya
359a2(mdo sde): zam pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/
359a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
359a4(mdo sde): chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus me g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
359a5(mdo sde): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
359a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rtag tu skabs
359a7(mdo sde): phyes/ byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems
359b1(mdo sde): rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub/
359b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos du dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar
359b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa ma lags pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du tshe ring du skyong bar bgyid pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
359b4(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so//
359b5(mdo sde): byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
359b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir byams pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig
359b7(mdo sde): dang / ngas bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la
360a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis bgegs bya/
360a2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du sbyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag/
360a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// lta pa dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par chos sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams
360a4(mdo sde): cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyobs tshor bsgoms pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par mchod
360a5(mdo sde): rten rnying pa gsos pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga pa de dag
360a6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe/
360a7(mdo sde): ring du skyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos lnga bstan pa 'di bshad pa na//
360b1(mdo sde): dge slong lnga stang ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// wa'i bu brgyad khri
360b2(mdo sde): bzhi stong ri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba nyon mongs pa med par rnam par dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po
360b3(mdo sde): byabs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
360b4(mdo sde): kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas de'i tshe stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
360b5(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
360b6(mdo sde): to// sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug thams cad kyi bro nad can/ lta ba thams cad kyi rab rib dang / ling tog gi mun pas bsgribs pa thams cad kyi bro nad
360b7(mdo sde): gas pa dang / chos kyi mig bla na med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni/ a la la rmad du byung ba chen po lags so// bcom ldan
361a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni/ a la la bdud rtsi chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni/ a la la sman pa'i rgyal
361a2(mdo sde): po chen po lta bu lags so// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa yang rung ste/ gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs bsags
361a3(mdo sde): pa dag ste/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa lags/ sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba dang ldan pa lags/ skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
361a4(mdo sde): bskrun pa lags so// de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su dag nas/ dud 'gro'i yul de las yongs su thar te/ mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing / thob nas kyang tshe rabs snga ma dran te/
361a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'tshal ba de dang der skye bar 'gyur na/ mir gyur nas thos pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal//
361a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni de ltar sems can rnams kyi don chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni
361a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa'i tshogs la gnas par 'gyur ba lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
361b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
361b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ byams pa legs so legs so// byams pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no// de ni bder no// de ni kho na'o// de ni ma nor ba'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di the
361b3(mdo sde): chom dang bcas pas zos pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag the tshom med par nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
361b4(mdo sde): chub par byed pa dang / rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ltams kyang ci dgos/ mdado rje 'dzin pa de lta bu de dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag la 'dod chags dang / zheng
361b5(mdo sde): dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la rims nad dam nada'abyung bar mi 'gyur ro// yul gang na med
361b6(mdo sde): sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba gnas pa'am/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te yod pa'i yul der nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang /
361b7(mdo sde): 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad
362a1(mdo sde): ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab cing / sangs rgyas byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba'i 'jig pa chen pos
362a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa na/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de dag la gzi byin brtsal bar bgyi'o// yul gang na mdo sde 'dzin
362a3(mdo sde): pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der/ bdag gis dus ma lags po'i ser ba dang / dgung char dang / mu ge dang / bre nad yang ba dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'go ba'i
362a4(mdo sde): nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / glegs bam du bgyis pa 'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mar
362a5(mdo sde): btags pa la mchod pa gyid pa'i yul der bdag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang / chom rkun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i yang ba thams cad rab
362a6(mdo sde): tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang dag na chos smra ba 'di lta bu dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul de bdag gis me tog dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras
362a7(mdo sde): thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir
362b1(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa
362b2(mdo sde): legs se legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad kyis/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus la bab cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
362b3(mdo sde): 'jig par 'gyur la/ 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad la bstan par bya'o// rab tu bsgrag par bya'o//
362b4(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mos pa bskyed par bya'o// don dam pa'i chos nyid tshad mar byas la/ mngon par brtson pas las gzhan mi bya bar rab tu bsgrag par bya'o// don dam pa'i chos
362b5(mdo sde): nyid kho na las brtsams te dbang du byas la bstan par bya'o// ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par don rtogs par 'gyur
362b6(mdo sde): ba de ltar bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs
362b7(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mjug tu phyin pa'i dus la bab par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang
363a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la lha'i me tog dang / dug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang //
363a2(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod nas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyis pa chos kyi rnam grangs
363a3(mdo sde): 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi brjod pa legs so zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos
363a4(mdo sde): par dkas/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ yi ger bris shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ rmo dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/
363a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
363a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/
363a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
363b1(mdo sde): de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
363b2(mdo sde): pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / chos kyi rgyu mo/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
363b3(mdo sde): sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste// bam po dang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal ma sbyor la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims
363b4(mdo sde): chen po bshad pa/ sems zag pa nas tshan cig/ mdza' tshogs pa yid bsdus so nyon cig/ bdag la kun du byu 'ang bar shes na/ mthol tshangs byas shig/ mthal tshangs
363b5(mdo sde): byas na bde bar 'gyur ro// mthol tshangs ma byas na/ sdig phyir zhing zab tu skye'o// kun tu ltung ba med na/ ma smra bar 'khod cig/ kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no// legs pa
363b6(mdo sde): chen po yod pa'i rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyan cig/ spangasu rgyus mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir/ mchod rten las chos byed pa'i tshe/
363b7(mdo sde): sor thar pa la brtson cing lci ba dang / gus shing rin cher byos shig/ so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no// tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mchungs
364a1(mdo sde): mi dbul pa las na chen pa thob pa dang mtshungs so// nang pa sran rnyed pa dang mtshungs so// brgyad khri ma na nas byung ba dang mtshungs so// la sa ring ba mang ba las sngar
364a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba dang mtshungs te/ 'di ni kun gyi mkhar po chen po yin par mngon pas/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do// 'jigs pa'i sems ni skye dkara'/ dge
364a3(mdo sde): ba'i sems ni g.yo dka' bas na/ kha na ma tho ba las brnyes te byed sgrum du byas na/ chu'i thigs pa chung ma kyai/ rgyun gyis na snang chen po gang nga // yud tsam gyi ba bar du sdig byas pas
364a4(mdo sde): na/ bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo // re zhig mI'i lus sbyar na/ bskal pa khri'i bar du yang slar mi'i lus mi thob go/ dar ba'i tshe mi sdong ngo // dper na ni
364a5(mdo sde): brgyugs pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe yang rtag pa med de/ dba' rgal gyi chu 'bab pa byas kyang myur te/ de ring gson mod kyi/ sang gi gnya' yang dka' 'o// da dus kho na la bab kyis//
364a6(mdo sde): med pa'i rnams so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so// bag byas la le lo bla khyad dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis log cing / rang nyams kyis
364a7(mdo sde): yid mi bya'o// mtshan zhing di sems bsdus la/ rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la/ phyal po don med pa la/ nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la yang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar ci'ang
364b1(mdo sde): thub pa med pa mi bya'o// mang ba'i rnams gcig dus gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs par byas shig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par spang mdzad kyis mang ba'i phyir chub gang+gA'i brgya stong gi
364b2(mdo sde): bye ba skyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chus kyi sgo mo'i yang bye ste/ dri'i nang nas sems kyi gnas spu rtag ma'i mig rnyed do// snga ma 'das pa'i sas rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do//
364b3(mdo sde): ltar gyi sangs rgyas la yang de bzhin 'chad do// ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' lebs pa dang //
364b4(mdo sde): slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ro// ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na/ nga'i mkhan pa rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o// khyed sangs rgyas thams
364b5(mdo sde): cad kyi ngas bshad de cog gcig nas gcig tu sems can thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye zhig/ de nas pad+mo'i snying pa'i sngon gyi khams na/ gnam gyi 'od ldam me lung nge ba'i
364b6(mdo sde): si de'i gdan gyi spyong na/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btung ste/ 'og gi me tog sang gi zag gi sangs rgyas la sban te/ nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo pha ro la rus zung
364b7(mdo sde): su bzung la deng zhig/ yang gcig ras gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas/ sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi
365a1(mdo sde): chos kyi sgra ba'i le'u shad do// khyed la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig/ de nas me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i
365a2(mdo sde): yang brag stong gi shAkya thub pa pad+ma'i snod kyi khams na/ l+h+wam maM wang nge ba'i seng ge'i khri las langs te/ so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te phyir ru ra nas/ lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab
365a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'od btang ste/ 'od kun gyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas byung ste/ cig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/ ser po dmar po/ dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku
365a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la yan du gsol nas/ yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa yang khong du chud nas/ so sor pad+ma'i snod kyi nang du rub ste/ rang bzhin gyi skal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub
365a5(mdo sde): nas/ me tog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnas su slar song ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ rang bzhin gyi skal pa me to ga 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin
365a6(mdo sde): las byung ste/ gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang / 'od shin tu bzang ba'i khang par 'dug nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa bshad do// de nas yang seng ge'i khri
365a7(mdo sde): las longs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas/ gral bcu'i chos bshad do// de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te las su bya ba bcu bshad do// de nas yang khri las langs
365b1(mdo sde): te/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du byin nas/ phyogs shing sa pa bcu bshad do// de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ 'phrul dga'i gdam du phyin nas/ bsapa gtan mi 'gyur ba bcupa/
365b2(mdo sde): do// de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ gnam bden gnam du phyin nas/ sa bcu'i chos bshad do// de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas/ rdo rje bcu bshad
365b3(mdo sde): de de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas/ bzod pa bcu'i chos shad do// de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas/ smon lam bcu bshad do// de nas yang
365b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang dbang mchog 'dum ched dag nam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ nga'i theg ma phyi mo'i pad+ma me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i
365b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi ma'i le'u bshad pa bshad do// gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag spang gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te/ gnyis su med do// tha dad pa yang med
365b6(mdo sde): da bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do// de'i tshe shAkya thub pa pad+ma ri me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas byung nas/ lding ba'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas
365b7(mdo sde): bdud kyis ches gnod pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/ yas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka phyi lar skyes nas/ yum gyi mtshan mi lha mongs chen mo/ yab kyi mtshan ni zas gtsang ma/ rabadag gi
366a1(mdo sde): ming ni si ta ra zhes bya ste/ ma bdun na rab tu byung / lo sum chu nas sangs rgyas su byin nas/ nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar
366a2(mdo sde): rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas/ dbang ba'i chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang
366a3(mdo sde): ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po/ dra ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir/ grangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na/ khams gcig nas gcig so so'o mi
366a4(mdo sde): mthun te/ tha dad pa'i grangs med do// sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sku ma bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// ngas khams 'dir lan brgyad stong byin te/ khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i/
366a5(mdo sde): khri steng du 'dug ste/ dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal ba'i pho brang du phyin nas/ de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo phye'o// de nas gnas kyi pho brang nas mar babs te/
366a6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi ma rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang
366a7(mdo sde): bshad do// sems thog ma g.yos pa ni/ rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klog go/ rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi thog ma'i phyi ma yin no// bya
366b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni/ thog ma phyil sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo ba nyid kyis phan na// sems can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi rab tu kyi skal ba ma dang // thams cad
366b2(mdo sde): kyi shes pa dang / kha dog dang / sems dang / yid dang / sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yud du rtag par
366b3(mdo sde): bsod dpas yod do// rtag par yun du dag par chos kyi lus yod do// sa sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas/ chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/ dus gsum
366b4(mdo sde): gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to// ngas dbang po 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do// rdzogs longs spyod pa bdag ste//
366b5(mdo sde): pad+mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas// mtha' bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng // shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs// me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya// khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig
366b6(mdo sde): kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son// de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong // rdzogs longs spyad pa rang bzhin lus// sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong /
366b7(mdo sde): po// kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren// cig ca nga yi gnas su 'ongs// sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims ton// zil dang raska ma de nas bye// 'ung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong pa/
367a1(mdo sde): slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin// kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// nga yi mkhan po tshul khrims kha ton ldogs// tshul khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad/
367a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin// gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin// 'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub// gdod pa rdzogs longs spyod
367a3(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis bklags// ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton bklags// byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa/ klad la khyer zhing khrims gzung bzhin// thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston//
367a4(mdo sde): nga yi bde brag rtag par nyan// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims sdod// so sor thar pa shes rab bzhin// mang po yid kun brtag par ches// khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par
367a5(mdo sde): 'ong // nga yi sangs rgyas byin zin kyang // rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed// tshul khrims le'u kun chog tshang yin// yid sems yod pa thams cad ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas
367a6(mdo sde): khrims kyis bsdu// sems can sangs rgyas khrims nod pa// de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin// tsher chen sa dang mtshungs zin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag/ mang po kun gyis
367a7(mdo sde): gus par byas// sems gcig brtul te nga klog nyon// de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas// thog ma byang chub shing drang bzhugs// bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//
367b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i mdud pa ni/ pa ma dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri'u dang / yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o// sri 'u byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi
367b2(mdo sde): 'gal ba ni/ chos zab mor thub pa'i gzhung ste/ srid zhu'i ming ni tshul khrims so// ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang / gtong ba'o// de nas 'od sdang ba grangs med pa' byung ngo // de'i
367b3(mdo sde): tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang ba tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi ming dang /
367b4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ sems gcig tu mnyan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po bklags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ngad ltar
367b5(mdo sde): zla ba byed byed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go/ khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha
367b6(mdo sde): ton du lhogs shig/ sems g.yos te phyogs pa bcu dang / g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang / rdo rje bcu dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang kha ton du lcogs shig
367b7(mdo sde): 'ung ni tshul khrims kyi 'od kho nas byung ste/ rgyu yod rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/ 'od sngon po dang / dmar po/ ser po/ dkar po/ nag po'ang ma yin/ kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems kyang
368a1(mdo sde): ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa' nga ma yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/
368a2(mdo sde): kyi ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na/ mang po thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su bzung ba'i
368a3(mdo sde): rigs so// legs par bslabs pa'i rigs so// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams rtag par nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po che ba
368a4(mdo sde): dang / dge slong po mos dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams gnam drug dang / gdol pa dang / nyid grub dang / po g.yeng dang / mo g.yeng dang
368a5(mdo sde): bran pa mos dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag brnyan dang / byol song dang / 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i mi la sogs te/ chos kyis mkhan po'i tshig mda' phrad pa'i rnams thams cad
368a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims mdod du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ so sor thar pa phas pham pa bcu
368a7(mdo sde): yod do// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton dum bklags na byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin/ ngarang 'di bzhin du kha ton du
368b1(mdo sde): thog go/ lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas
368b2(mdo sde): so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mad tsam zhig bshad kyis/ bslab cing gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis bas/
368b3(mdo sde): pa dang / mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod pa la sdod pa/ gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems pa/ sngags dang rngad ma byas te bsad pa/ gsod pa'i rgyu/
368b4(mdo sde): gsod pa'i rkyen gsod pa'i chos byed pa/ gsod pa'i las byed pa la sogs te/ sems yod da cog la ched kar gsod du mi rung / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni
368b5(mdo sde): rtag par snying rje ba dang / sri zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te/ bags kyis sems can thams cad kyi ra mda' dang / 'or pa bya ba'i rigs so// bdag gis rang
368b6(mdo sde): nyams byas te/ snying tshim par sems can bsad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pa logs po ma byin par
368b7(mdo sde): len du bcug gapa/ thabs kyis ma byin pa dablangs sam/ ma byin par len pa'i rgyud ma byin par len pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyu ma byas so nor khyem la sogs te//
369a1(mdo sde): lha ma srin dang / bdag pa yod pa dang / yang glo'i nor rdzas dang / nor rdzas so cog la khab dang / rtswa nyag ma gcig la ngas ched kar ma byin par blangs su mi rung
369a2(mdo sde): ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'gal zhing / byams shing snying rje bar byas te/ rtag par sems can ne cog gi yon tan dang
369a3(mdo sde): bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so// de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par
369a4(mdo sde): spyod dam/ gzhan yang mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nas/ bud med do cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang / gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i
369a5(mdo sde): rgyu dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang / byos song dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu
369a6(mdo sde): la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad thar pa'i ra
369a7(mdo sde): mda' bya zhing chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs so// de la slar mo'o cag la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/ byol song dang / ma dang / bu bo dang / sring po la
369b1(mdo sde): sogs te/ gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/ byabs shing snying rje ba med na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis brdzur byas
369b2(mdo sde): sam/ pha rol po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis brdzur byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang / brdzun gyi chos byed pa dang / brdzun
369b3(mdo sde): gyi las byed pa dang / mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer/ ma mthong ba la ni mthong zhes zer/ lus dang sems kyis brdzunu byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig
369b4(mdo sde): drang po skye zhing / gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshig mi drang ba dang / yon po la lta ba dang / yin pa
369b5(mdo sde): las byed par bskyed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu spro ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam/ pha logs pa smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/
369b6(mdo sde): thabs kyis smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ngam/ smra ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/ skyo ba'i khu bo 'tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshang ba'i chos byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu
369b7(mdo sde): ba 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/ skyo ba'i khu ba'o cog 'tshong du mi rung // skyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho bo skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni sem so can
370a1(mdo sde): thams cad la snang zhing / thar pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed na/ byang chub
370a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes po bdag gis
370a3(mdo sde): 'phyas su byas sam/ gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan tam/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byos sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang / 'phya ba'i las byed na// byang chub sems
370a4(mdo sde): dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / theg pa chung du rnam gnyis byed pa'i mi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par snying rje bskyed na/ ngan pa'i
370a5(mdo sde): rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslabs pa'i rigs na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' slar log par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nyes zhes bshad na/ de ni byang
370a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdag gis bdag bstod cing / phar smad pa dang / gzhan la bdag bstod/ par smod par ston pa/ spyod pa'i rgyu/ smod pa'i
370a7(mdo sde): rkyen byed pa/ smod pa'i chos dang / smod pa'i las byen na// byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin par sla dbab cing / ngan sems pa ni bdag gis blangs te/ dge
370b1(mdo sde): zhing legs pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na/ la la zhig gis bdag gi legs pa ni brnyad/ gzhan gyi legs pa ni bcabs te/ gzhan la smad/ spa bab par byas na/ de ni byang chub sems
370b2(mdo sde): dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna che'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ ser sna che ba'i rkyen byed dam/ ser sna'i
370b3(mdo sde): chos byed dam/ srer sna'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs sa cog dang / gzhan ci 'dod pa bzhin dgongs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan du
370b4(mdo sde): sems shing / sems la gshe ba dang / dang tse gcig gam/ khab gcig gam/ rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/ chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na/ tshig gcig le'u gcig rdul
370b5(mdo sde): tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/ slar ngag ngan pas spros te sma bab na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/ mi pa logs pa khro bar ston tam/
370b6(mdo sde): khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed dma?/ khro bo'i chos byed dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing // 'thab
370b7(mdo sde): cing rtsod pa med par byas la/ rtag par snying rje skyed cing / bya ba'i rigs kyi phyir log par sems can thams cad kyi nang na/ sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing lag pas
371a1(mdo sde): 'chog pa dang / ral gri dang dbyig pas gdab cing / bdegs kyang snying brtse ma dris te ka pa logs po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing / gnang
371a2(mdo sde): bar yang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/ gzhan dkon
371a3(mdo sde): mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
371a4(mdo sde): mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi nang tshig gcig/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra skang la yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong thos na mdung rtse gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na bdag gi
371a5(mdo sde): kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yid ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par ma rabs log pa la lta zhing / ma yin
371a6(mdo sde): zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// dge zhugs spyod pa'i rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rigs so//
371a7(mdo sde): 'di'i nang nas yul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na/ tshul khrims bcu tshang bar zhig pa so spos kyang ci dgos la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na/ daltar gyi lus la
371b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las la ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral yang sbyor/ 'khor ma bskor ba'i rgyal ba'i grul yang skor/ dge slong dang dge slong ma'i gral
371b2(mdo sde): yang skor/ g.yos shing phyogs bcu dang / bskyed cing gsol ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ta ma pa/ yon tan zab mo la
371b3(mdo sde): sogs pa'i zad par stor nas/ ngan song gsum du ltung ste/ bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi zos te/ de bas na gcig
371b4(mdo sde): kyang gzhig tu mi rung ngo // khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te/
371b5(mdo sde): rtag par gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri'i nang nas rgya cher bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/
371b6(mdo sde): pas pham pa bcu ni bshad zin to// ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /
371b7(mdo sde): blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nod pa'i rigs so// rung tang lha ma srin thams cad kyang / rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi
372a1(mdo sde): rim gro dang skyabs byed do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgyes so// tshul khrims thob zin na/ sri'u dang mi 'gal ba'i sems dang / sems la gus par
372a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i sems pa bskyed de/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang / mtshungs par mthong ba dang / las
372a3(mdo sde): mthun par byed pa mtho na langs te/ bsul phyag 'tshal te na 'dri ba'i rigs so// byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / glen pa'i sems bskyed de/ ma
372a4(mdo sde): langs ma bsu phyag ma byas te/ ci la'ang chos bzhin du rjes dang / rim dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul mkhar dang / bos mos dang / nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor bcog
372a5(mdo sde): btsongs la/ dgas sa cog ma sbyar te/ de lta na rus na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bul la che dkar chang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa
372a6(mdo sde): sbyar ro// lnga la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang / lag gis chang sdong blas te/ ma~M pha rol pa la byin te blung na/ tshe 'bras lnga brgya'i bor du lag pa med par 'dzin/ bdaga'
372a7(mdo sde): blta spos kyang ci dgas/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'acog thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan du mi rung ngo // bdag rang 'thung ba la spos kyang rtsi dgas te/
372b1(mdo sde): bdag ched dkar 'thungs pa dang / pha rol po bdar ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sha ched dkar zos pa dang / sha'o cog bzar mi rung ste/ zos na snying rje zhing byabs pa'i rang
372b2(mdo sde): bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na 'jigs nas spong ngo // de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi sha bzar mi rung // sha zos pa
372b3(mdo sde): ni sdig grangs med do// sha zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dgu pa rnam lnga bzar mi rung ngo // sgog pa dang / btsong dang / rgya sgog dang / ri sgog rnams dang /
372b4(mdo sde): shing kun dang / 'di rnam lnga kha zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo // la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad
372b5(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims lnga dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / rtsa ba rnam bzhi bshig pa dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa sdig byed pa mthong na/ mthel
372b6(mdo sde): tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigs so// de las byang chub sems dpa' ma bstan te/ mthol mtshangs byed ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'dug 'dug cing / tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i
372b7(mdo sde): dge dun gyi rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims bshad pa'i tshe/ sdig dngos su byung gis/ nyes pa mthol tshangs byed du chug cig/ ma bcug na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas
373a1(mdo sde): kyi bu bakhad pa theg pa chen po la lhan cigs pa/ wad cig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na/ rgyang grags stong gi
373a2(mdo sde): la ba na chur longs na ni bsu/ 'gro ba ni bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te bkur sti dang / ri mo dang / nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri me byabanyi ma gcig gi zad du gser srang gsum
373a3(mdo sde): gyi kha zas dang / khri star dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te/ byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gter te/ dus gsum du chos bshad de/ nyin
373a4(mdo sde): gcig cing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la/ khro ba'i sems dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so// chos kyi phyir lus dang bsngos te chos gsol lo// de ltar ma byas
373a5(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang mdo sde 'chad pa'i khangabo khyim chen po'i nang na chos 'o chang pa yod na byang chub sems dpa' ga sar du
373a6(mdo sde): slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la/ gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so// la la zhig ri dang / tshal dang / shing gi drung dang / dge
373a7(mdo sde): 'dun gyi sa dang / khyim gyi nang dang / chos 'chad do cog gi sar phyin par byas te/ mnyan cing 'dod do// de'i gnas su song ste/ ma mnyan ma mnos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems//
373b1(mdo sde): ni theg pa chen po dang 'grel zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims la 'dug kyang khar sma na sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par
373b2(mdo sde): theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing log par lta ba'o cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mi
373b3(mdo sde): nad kyis btab be cog rtag par rim gro byas te/ gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na/ dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na nad pa la lta zhing ga so sa
373b4(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o// pa ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma dang / dbang po ma tshang ba ga nad da cog gis btab cing don
373b5(mdo sde): mongs na/ kun kyang gsos te sos par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lha gshe zhing ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul mkhar du ma byin pa/ g.ye
373b6(mdo sde): dang / ri lung dang / mkhar dang / tshal na nod pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ ra mda' dang rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung dung dang /
373b7(mdo sde): sa re la sogs te 'thab pa'i spyang/ mtshan cha dang / sems can gsod pa'i spyad dang 'drab / rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chang du mi rung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni pa ma gzhan gyis
374a1(mdo sde): gsod kyang sha mi blan na/ sems can thams cad gsod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshon cha ched kar 'chang ba na ltung ba'o// 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams bcu
374a2(mdo sde): ni bslabs te/ drug par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so// 'ag ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya che rabashad do// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas
374a3(mdo sde): kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/ nyi 'og gi yul du pi tar 'grul ba dmag gi g.yul ba shams te dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te/ sems can mang po bsad
374a4(mdo sde): na/ byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing / phan tshun du 'grul yang me rung na/ che dkar g.yul gyi dgra byed pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la che da kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o//
374a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang bran po sa mos dang / phyugs dag sna drug dang / gshin sgrom ro gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa khe dang tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na/
374a6(mdo sde): gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de/ pa logs po dge ba des pa/ chos kyi mkhan po
374a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun rgyal po ya rabs btsun pa la mnyes par log pa bdun dang / pham pa bcu dang / pha ma dang / bu po nu bor / gnyen pa rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshig go zhes
374b1(mdo sde): bsru na/ srinu drang mi 'gal zhing byams shing snying rje'i sems paskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gnas su lnga da lung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
374b2(mdo sde): ngag sems bskyed de/ ched dkar me chen po btang la/ ri dang tshal/ g.ye dang ri lung dang / dbyar zla ra ba man chad/ stor zla za chung yan bsregs sam/ la la zhig gis me btang
374b3(mdo sde): ste/ gzhan gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grang dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / zhing dang / skyed zhing dang / lham srid dang / bla'i 'khor la sogs te/ bdag po yod do
374b4(mdo sde): cog gi nor rdzas bsreg tu mi rung ngo // la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs kyi slob ma/ bdag dang / mur 'dug dang / gnyen
374b5(mdo sde): rnam drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen na cog kun kyang / ci'ang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims nod cing / gzus su 'dzin par bstan pa'i rigs so// gu'u
374b6(mdo sde): dang lugs shes shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang / rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu go
374b7(mdo sde): rims dang / chos kyi cho ga shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' la/ byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang zhe sdang ba skyed de/ gzhan nyan thos theg pa chung ngun ma gnyis kyi tshul
375a1(mdo sde): khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems kyis sngar theg pa
375a2(mdo sde): chen po'i ge cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas/ rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa rgyang grags brgya stong gi la ma nas/
375a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na/ chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rigs so// dka' thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/
375a4(mdo sde): lag drar bsregs pa sor mo bsregs pa'o// de la lus dang / lag ngar dang / sor mo bsregs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na/ de rab tu
375a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// stag dang / sbyang ka dang / seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang / 'dre ldog pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang ka rkang
375a6(mdo sde): ldeg gteng badra par byas te/ byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de sems ni bye/ yid ni gal bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gas pa'i
375a7(mdo sde): khe 'dod pa'i phyir/ lan blan pa'i rigs pa ni ma blan gyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims ri mo dang / 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas/ snga byi med par dkon mchog la 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni
375b1(mdo sde): srung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gas pa'i khe dang / mi spyan pa'i b+hir/ rgyal ba dang ka rgyal bu dang / blon pa chen pa la sogs pag ten zhes ze
375b2(mdo sde): tI/ skems shing nan gyis nor skyong la/ btsan dag gis bsdigs te/ nan gyis nor dang khe tshol ma cog gi ming ni ngan pa mang po tshal zhes bya'o// gzhan la'ang snying rje med cing /
375b3(mdo sde): sri gu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob na/ nyin gcig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems dpa
375b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims bzung / de'i gzhung dang don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shed par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yan tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par/ sgyu
375b5(mdo sde): ma'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba ni/ bdag la brnyas shing bslus/ gzhan la'ang bzlas te/ chos sa cog rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes par/ gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni
375b6(mdo sde): ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na pog snod khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la/ mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis rab
375b7(mdo sde): tu dpar bcug ste/ 'phags pa'i mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing / ngan mi byed pa med do zhes bskur te/ de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de gci'ang /
376a1(mdo sde): mi gsod par btang ba'i las byed cing pa la cog ni bdag gi ba yin/ ma' cog ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag sngon chad kyi tshe rabs la gang skyes cag na yang /
376a2(mdo sde): de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zos na/ bdag gi pha ma bsad do// gcig tu na bdag gi lus rnying pa bsad do// sa dang /
376a3(mdo sde): chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yin no// me dang rlung bcog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi ma yin pas/ rtag par gson par btang ba'i las byed/ gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can
376a4(mdo sde): gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de/ bdag gis 'or ba dang re mda' byas te/ nyon mongs shing 'phongs pa thar pa'o// rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad de bstan bslabs
376a5(mdo sde): nas/ sems can thar pa'i ra mda' bya'o// pha ma dang / bu bo dang / nu ba zhig shi na/ de'i nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na ka de'i
376a6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad de/ mtho ris su skye'o// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// // chos kyi rgya mo/ bam po gnyis pa
376a7(mdo sde): ste tha ma'o// 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs na/ sems gus par gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang / tshul khrims
376b1(mdo sde): gcig pu gcig pa nas rgya che zhing gsal bar bshad de// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ khros pa'i lan khros pas mi blan/ bdegs pa'i lan 'degs/
376b2(mdo sde): pas mi blan/ pha ma dang / bu chu bo gnyen rnam drug bsad krung sha blan du mi rung ngo // gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po bsad kyang sha blan du mi rung ngo // srog bcad de shA blo ma sri 'u'i
376b3(mdo sde): chos dang 'gal lo// bran po mo la ngag ngan pas spyos shing bdegs la nyin gcig dran pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la'ang sdig grangs med na/ ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sna bdun rgya
376b4(mdo sde): sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha blan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o// sangs
376b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung ste ci'ang mi shes par/ bdag dbang po rno la mdzangs pa rlom zhing / la la ni lo grangs rgan zhing phyugs btsan pa bsnyems te/ la la rus che zhing thabs
376b6(mdo sde): mtho ba dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang / nor rin po che sna bdun mang du bdog pas/ rgyags dregs sngan chad chos shes pa'i mkhan pa la yi ge dang / tshul khrims mi
376b7(mdo sde): gsol mi nod/ chos kyi mkhan pa la la ni rung chung / la la min gzhon/ la la ni thabs chung / la la ni dbul/ la la ni dbang po ma chang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa med de/ chos kyi
377a1(mdo sde): yi ge dang tshul khrims sa cog zad par shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slab bo// chos kyi slob dpon ma rigs pa dang / thabs la 'phral gang du/
377a2(mdo sde): bltas shing / chos kyi mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing / don du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na/ sems
377a3(mdo sde): dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing 'du na na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te zhag bdun gyi bar du/
377a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la/ ltas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob bo// ltas bzang po ma mthong na ni zhag bdun gnyis// bdun gsum ga lo gcig
377a5(mdo sde): gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis bzung ngo // ltas bzang po mthong nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod do// ltas
377a6(mdo sde): bzang po ma mthong na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnos kyang / ming tshul khrims thob bo zhes mi bya'o// la la zhig gis sngon chad
377a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod na/ ltas bzang po mi dgos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na// ltas
377b1(mdo sde): bzang ba mi dgos te/ chos kyi mkhan po de'i mdun du tshul khrims mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste/ gus pa'i sems skye'o// rgyang grags stong lam tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus/
377b2(mdo sde): pa'i mkhan po med la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nod na/ lhas bzang po mthong bar dgos so// chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig/ bdag
377b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blan pa rnams byams shing / mdza' ba bsnyems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slab pa/
377b4(mdo sde): chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drir 'ongs la la brnyas pa'i sems dang / ngan pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems kyisagacig pu gcig pu nas/ 'dri
377b5(mdo sde): ba'i lan ma blan na lung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang ba'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/
377b6(mdo sde): drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom mi nus pa rnams ni/ dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par ltas te/ theg pa chung ngu ma rnam gnyis dang / mur
377b7(mdo sde): 'dug gi chos dang / ma rabs kyi gzhung la bsten pa dang / a bi la dar ma bshad pa/ slob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug par slob na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chad pas
378a1(mdo sde): lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no// de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das
378a2(mdo sde): pa'i byin/ chos 'chad pa bdag po byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'brul pa'i bdag po dang bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i bdag po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag
378a3(mdo sde): po dang / de lta bu byed na/ byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ mi mdza' ste 'thab cing rtsod pa'ang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrungs te/ ma 'ongs
378a4(mdo sde): par mi spyad/ bdag gis bdag gi skor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o// de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang / rang rnams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi nor spyad/
378a5(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong 'gron pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyib dang / mkhar dang /
378a6(mdo sde): grong dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na/ sngan 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni bsug 'gro na ni bskyal te/ zas kyi
378a7(mdo sde): bsti stang dang / khang khyim dang / nyal ba'i mal cha dang / khri dang / sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin no// la la zhig bdag la nor med na/ bdag gi lus dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / btsangs te ci
378b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa kun sgyur 'i spyir dgas te/ sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te dge 'dun pal dang / dge 'dun kyi 'gron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon gyi nor skal ba yod pa'i sngar/ dge 'dun myi/
378b2(mdo sde): khyim bdag pos dge 'dun 'gran pa rnams rims kyis gnyer ba btang ste/ de la dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas/ bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'gron
378b3(mdo sde): pa ma btang na/ dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag pa sdig grangs med par zab ste/ byal song dang mtshungs so// dge sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/
378b4(mdo sde): de ltar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ci'ang gi rims sum bab par/ logs shig tu man blangs shing / bdag gir bkuru mi rung ngo // de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas ni/
378b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/ de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na/ bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas pa/
378b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rnams dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nad pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rab tu
378b7(mdo sde): byung ba dang / rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gi dge 'dun gter te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du song na/ dge ba skos la dris te/ de rang
379a1(mdo sde): go rims gang la bab pa gcer na/ phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun thob bo// kun nas dgra bcom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge 'dun lnga
379a2(mdo sde): bcu gter ba bas/ go rims su bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsadran pas che'o// de lus dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni/ mur 'dug ngan pa'i rdzas so// sangs rgyas bdudu/
379a3(mdo sde): ni gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do// sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas/ gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems spyad de/ gso ba'i khe'i phyir/ bos mos kyi/
379a4(mdo sde): g.yem pa 'tshong ba'i bdag dang cing zan byed pa dang / bdag rung ba/ bdug 'du ba/ phas mos kyi mtshan lha mi lam bzang ngan 'gro la/ po zhes zer/ ma zhes zer/ log pa'i chos kyi/
379a5(mdo sde): sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/ dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ dug gcog sbyor zhing byed la/ dug rtsi rnam pa brgyad stong byed de sbrul dug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang / byang snyems la sogs
379a6(mdo sde): pa snying rje yod byed pa lta bu/ ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngar sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus kyi dkon mchog gsum la skur pa byas te/ gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/
379a7(mdo sde): kha ni stong pa 'chad/ las ni yod pa'i las byed/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'i smar byed cing / mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/ ci la'ang mi 'jigs shing chags
379b1(mdo sde): pa med/ dus drug tum chud stor byed pa'i nyi ma dang / mu gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i rgyu/ sems can gsod/ rkun po dang tsham pa byed cing / mchod
379b2(mdo sde): stor gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la/ rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so// khrims bzung ba'i le'u'i rlung nas kyang rgya cher
379b3(mdo sde): mngon par bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin/ ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa'o cog dang /
379b4(mdo sde): rkun pa chen po sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ma/ chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ dge slong dang / dge slong ba
379b5(mdo sde): 'tshong ngam/ gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dang / la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas/ brang po bran mor byas pa zhig/ byang chub sems
379b6(mdo sde): dpa' de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed do// thabs kyi ra mda' dang skyabs byas te/ gnas gnas na 'gad do cog kyang / slar slob cing ston cig/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
379b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na/ nor gyis blus shig/ de ltar ma blus na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas
380a1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshan cha dang / mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang / tshang spogs byed pa dang / srang dang de chung 'chang ba dang / rtsa lag slebs shing mi gzhan la
380a2(mdo sde): nor len pa dang / sems la phrag dog byed de/ pha logs po bcings drags byas pa dang / ngos so don du yod pa zhig btang / byi la dang / sel byi dang / khyi dang / ba ga dang / bya
380a3(mdo sde): 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo // de lta bu ched kar gas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ bos mos la sog pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang / dgra tshom
380a4(mdo sde): po byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo // yang gcig tu ru nga 'bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / byim shir dang / jeng dang / gling bu dang / kong hi'u dang / glu len pa dang / rol me'i sgra la mnyan
380a5(mdo sde): du mi rung ngo // cho rje dang / mig mangs dang / par rtsig gi rtsed mo dang / ra 'dri lug dmag gi rtsed mo dang / pho leng rdob pa dang / rdo 'phrin gyir rtse ba dang / bum bu la bde bu 'phen pa dang
380a6(mdo sde): khras byed pa dang / me long 'brud pa byar mi rung ngo // rtsa rtsi tsha'u dang / rgya cang dang / phor bu kha ru ba dang / mi'i thod pa dang / de rnams la mo gdab tu mi rung ngo // rkun po'i than gyi phonya
380a7(mdo sde): la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung ngo // de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par gzung ba'i rim gro byas na/ 'gro nyal 'dug langs dang / nyin
380b1(mdo sde): mchan dus drug tu rgyal khrims la tan bklags / radza dang mazungams// rgyal pa thogs pa ma ma chen pa rnal ba dang mtshus so// gcig kun dge slong rdzas brtsis pa dang mazus
380b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam par ni dadu ngasangs rgyas su ma phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas kyi bu rams ni
380b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bar mi chad par sems la bsams la/ de la skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang / mur
380b4(mdo sde): 'dug la sems kyis bsam na lung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la/ pha ma dang / mkhan pa dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum lnga sri
380b5(mdo sde): du che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/ rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang / tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de/ rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge
380b6(mdo sde): dang / khrims dang / g.yo zhing phyogs pa bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu la sogs pa bdag bye zhing shes la/ chos bzhin du las byed par smon to// sangs
380b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims bzung la/ sran thub par bya ba ni bskyed cing gso gso ba bcu dang / lus dang / srog kyang bor te/ sems la sems dpa'i bar mi bcad par sems bsam mo//
381a1(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas
381a2(mdo sde): kyi tshul khrims gzungs su bzung ste/ smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo// bdag gi lus 'di ma chen po'i chen pos tshig kyang rung / khung zab ma dang / ral gri'i ril song yang /
381a3(mdo sde): rung ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang / nam du'ang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad la sogs pa mi byed par
381a4(mdo sde): ston to// gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lcags bsregs pa'i dra ba dang / de la bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te/ lus dkris kyang thar yun du tshul khrims dral
381a5(mdo sde): ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin ba dag gis gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// kha 'di'i nang du lpags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang / me chu/
381a6(mdo sde): bzhin du bapa ste 'ong ba la bskal pa rgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul khrims bshig pas khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams cad mi za bar ston to// yang gcig tu smon lam
381a7(mdo sde): 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di me chen pos bsregs/ lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi
381b1(mdo sde): khri 'a cog gi steng du mi 'dug par sman to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas gcags kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims/
381b2(mdo sde): babashig pa'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi za bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di bskal pa stong gi bar du lkugs kyi
381b3(mdo sde): zungs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims 'di 'dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyim ma cag dang / ldum ra dang / skyed shing dang / zhing gi steng du
381b4(mdo sde): mi 'dug par ldan to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di mag nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun bus brdungs te/ dul phra mo bzhin du song yang khrims dral
381b5(mdo sde): ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon te/ stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral
381b6(mdo sde): gri dang / mdung rtses mig gnyis brus shing gtsags kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis pha logs kyi kha dog bzang po la mi blta bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar
381b7(mdo sde): smon to// yang gcig gis bskung bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang / rna ba'i rtsa bar btsugs kyang / tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan
382a1(mdo sde): pa la mi rgan par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smon to// bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing bzhogs kyang / khrims
382a2(mdo sde): dral ba'i sems kyis spros so cog la mi snom par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du l+le ral gris bcad gtu bas kyang khrims dral ba'i
382a3(mdo sde): sems kyis mi 'o cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon las 'di ltar smon to// sta ri rnon pos lus bcad gtu bas kyang mthar tshul khrims dral
382a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi bskams mi chags par smon to// yang gcig tu spor lam 'di ltar smon to// sems can na cog sangs rgyas su yod par smon to// byang
382a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lab ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa dgun dang / dbyar bsam gtar du 'jug pa dang / tshul
382a6(mdo sde): khrims su 'jug pa so shing rlung / sran phye dang / chos gos gsum dang / ril ba dang / lhung bzed dang / gding ba dang / gsil byed dang / pog por dang / chu tshags dang / lag
382a7(mdo sde): byis dang / gri dang / gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / wang tsher dang / tha gu'i khri dang / dar ma dang / khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa'i chagrong rgyu ba'i tshe/ 'gro
382b1(mdo sde): ming 'ongs na/ rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na/ yo byad bco brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni dpyid zlar ba'i tshe bco lnga nas/ dpyid blaT rgyang chos bco lnga'i
382b2(mdo sde): bar du'o// ston zla 'bring ba'i tshes bco lnganas/ dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bco brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/ dper na bya'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o// de ste gso sbyir
382b3(mdo sde): gyi rtsi ba la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba byed byed cing kha ton du bas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi kha ton du lcogs shig/ de ste khrims
382b4(mdo sde): bklag pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang / gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton bklags la/
382b5(mdo sde): gcig gis 'thol tshangs bya ste/ gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gang yang rung ste/ steng po rgya de'ang mi gcig gis kha ton klog go/ kha ton klog pa ni sa mthon po la 'dug la/ nyan
382b6(mdo sde): ni dma' ba la 'dug go/ so sa nas chos gos tshul bu dgu pa dang / lnga pa dang / bdun pa dgos te/ tshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o// sbyangs pa'i yon tan
382b7(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshe/ bgegs yod cing mi bde ba'i nang dum 'gro zhig/ yul gyi bgegs dang / rgyal po mi bsrun pa dang / sa mtho dman dang / rtsi shing zab mo dang / dbyar seng ge dang /
383a1(mdo sde): stag dang / spyang ki dang gachu steg rlung gi bgegs dang / rkun pa chom po dang / sbrul gdug pa'i lam la sogs te/ bgegs yod da cag thams cad du sbyangs
383a2(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo // de la tshod dkar song ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig/ tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dugacig
383a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni phyis nas 'dug cig/ rgan gzhon mi lta/ dge slong pho dang / dge slong mo dang / ya rabs dang / btsun pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / nyung grub dang /
383a4(mdo sde): bran pos mos la sogs pa tshul khrims nos pa ni sngar 'dug cig/ phyis nos pa ni phyis go rims bzhin du 'dug cig/ mur 'dug ngan pa dang / mi glen pa bzhin du rgan yang ru nga//
383a5(mdo sde): gzhon yang rung / snga med phyi med pa'i go rims med pa ni/ g.yung po bran gyi chos song / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang ni/ snga ma ni steng du 'dug/ phyi ma ni 'og tu 'dug go/ byang chub
383a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni chos bzhin du go rims su ma 'khod na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems can na cog bstan cing bcos te/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing re dang / tshal dang /
383a7(mdo sde): ra ba dang / zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang pa byas la dbyar dgun du tshul dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang / gtsang ma'i 'chags 'dzugs su gzhug pa'i rigs so//
383b1(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems cad da cog gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chos drung / tshul khrims kyi yi ge bkrol bshad na/ nabar cha byung ba dang / yul gyi bgregs dang dgra'i
383b2(mdo sde): bgegs dang / pa pa dang / pu nu dang / mkhar pa la sogs pa thog ma shi ba'i dus dang / bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang / bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang / bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang / bdun bdun gyi
383b3(mdo sde): ni ma la ga de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims bkrol bshad de/ mchod ston byas te/ dge bsod nams thob par gsol cig/ 'gro longs kyang gson pa'i mtsho bsod nams
383b4(mdo sde): byed pa la me chen pos bsregs/ chu chen pos khyer/ rlung nag po chen pos gru bus pa dang / gtsang po dang / mtsho chen po'i dgra bgegs la sogs te/ sdig go tsog bgegs dang lan gyis
383b5(mdo sde): na/ mtshams med pa bdun/ bgegs brgyad lag sgril/ kang sgril / ltung dang / lcags dang / lus bcings drags te/ g.yem zhing khro ba mang po dang / blun zhing glen pa mang po dang /
383b6(mdo sde): mtsha mang ba'i dgra zlas na/ kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims kha ton bklags te dkrol bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' gser du slob pa 'di bzhin
383b7(mdo sde): pa byas na ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la ga gus par rtag par gzungs su zung zhig/ snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do// sangs
384a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bus mi la tshul khrims shig sbyin na/ bye brag dbye zhing gdam du mi rung / rgyal po dang / rgyal
384a2(mdo sde): bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po phal dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / po g.yem mo g.yem dang / gzugs kyi gnas
384a3(mdo sde): bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang / dbang po med pa dang / dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang / nyung rum dang / bran pos mo sa dang / lha ma srin la sogs
384a4(mdo sde): te/ thams cad kun khrims mnod du rung ngo // lus la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni/ kha dog bsgyur bar ston la/ chos dang mthun par gyis shig/ kha dog ser po/ sngon pa
384a5(mdo sde): nag po/ dmar po/ lam gos yan chad kha dog bsgyur ro// lus la gos so cog chos te/ kha dog sgyur cig/ yul lo cog na na mi'i gos su bgo ba la/ dge slong nga cog gi
384a6(mdo sde): gros ni/ tha mal pa'i gos dang mi mthun no// thog mi tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe/ mkhan pos dri ba/ khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdud gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig dang / chos
384a7(mdo sde): kyi mkhan pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyir du mi rung ngo // log pa bdun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba dang pa ma dang / mkhan
384b1(mdo sde): ba dang / sgrub dpa bas pa dang / lus kyi tshul khribs gtsang sa bshig pa dang / chos kyi 'khar la bsku rab pa'i 'phags pa bsad pa yin te/ 'di na pa bdun chung bar byas/
384b2(mdo sde): te/ bsgribs pa'i tshul la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo // gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims spyir du rung ngo // rab tu byung ba'i chos ni rgyal po la' dbyug mi 'tshal/
384b3(mdo sde): pam la' dbyug mi'u tshal/ gnyen pa rnam pa drug la'ang shes mi bya/ lha ba sprin la'ang phyug mi 'tshal chos kyi mkhan po srid shes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi lam
384b4(mdo sde): nas 'ong ste/ khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mkhan pos ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de sems can na cog la tshul khrims
384b5(mdo sde): pa byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te yid ches pa'i sems g.yo bar bya na/ byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan
384b6(mdo sde): po byas te/ tshul khrims mnod du 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong na/ sngar mkhan pa slob dpon gnyer du zang zhig/ mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig
384b7(mdo sde): yod dam dris shig/ de la yang tshe 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na/ mkhan pos tshul khrims sbyin pa mi rigs so// bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig med na/ tshul
385a1(mdo sde): khrims sbyin du rung ngo // la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu gzhig pa yod na/ mthol tshangs byed du chug cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
385a2(mdo sde): zhal sngar nyid mtshan drug tu phamo pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du bklags la/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems zag pa nas phyag 'tshal
385a3(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/ lhas bzang por bya dgos so// de la nyi ma bdun dang / bdun gnyis dang / bdun gsum dang / lo gcig tshun chad ltas bzang po mthong dgos so// ltas bzang po
385a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gshegs te/ spyi ba la byugs te/ 'od mthong ba dang / me tog mthong ba dang / ltas ci'a'arung / bzang po mthong na/ mod la sdig 'byed do// de la ltas
385a5(mdo sde): bzang po med na/ 'thol tshangs su zin kyang mi phan te/ de'i tshe lus kyis ni tshul khrims mi thob bo// lo dang nyi mas bstan te spobs te byas la/ lhas 'od byung ba dag mthong na/
385a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims mnor du rung ngo // la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bshig pa ni/ mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so// de bas
385a7(mdo sde): mtshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pos/ chos 'di'i nang nas kyang / gcig nas gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o// theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yang ba dang / sgrib
385b1(mdo sde): dang / yin pa dang / ma yin pa'i gzugs dam pa mi shes na/ gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon dang / da wAr bskyed cing gsol ba'i rang bzhin dang /
385b2(mdo sde): gtan mi rlag pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin dang / drang po'i rang bzhin dang / de'i nang nas rtogs pa dang / dpyod pa'i rang bzhin dang / byi nang gi bsam
385b3(mdo sde): gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te/ chos kyi las bya'o// cho ga dang / tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge 'di gcig nas gcig khong du chud de/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yo ba'i
385b4(mdo sde): khe dang / ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i slob ma la khe bsam pas/ ngan pa btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge kun shes so zhes zer zhing / yon len pa'i bdag la'ang
385b5(mdo sde): bslus shing / brnyas gcig tu na gzhan la'ang bslus shing brnyas te/ de lta bus mi la tshul khrims byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i
385b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdud du mur 'dug dang ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen po 'di bshad du mi rung ngo // log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo // rgyal
385b7(mdo sde): ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du'ang bshad du mi rung ngo // mi ngan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pa ni mi byol song zhes bya'o// gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog
386a1(mdo sde): gsum mi mthong zhing / rdo shing dang mthu s+yA/ sems med de/ ming chos log pa zhes bya'o// lag pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing du ba dang mtshungs so// byung /
386a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de bstan na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi chul
386a3(mdo sde): khrims dam pa nos la/ ched kar sems bskyed do// 'phags pa'i tshul khrims bshig na/ sbyin bdag go cog gi yon bslang du ni mi rung ngo // gcig tu rgyal ba'i khab kyi sa ri swa la 'ang
386a4(mdo sde): 'gror mi rung / rgyal po'i chu la 'ang 'thung ngu mi rung ste/ 'dre chen po lnga stong gis rtag par do'i mdun bcad nas 'dren re/ dgra chen po khyim dang / mkhar dang / yul gyi nang du
